Class Monster

java.lang.Object
entities.Entity
entities.Monster
public class Monster extends Entity
Representation of a monster that can be found in the maze

05262024
Author:
Dhruv Solanki

  • Constructor Details

    • Monster

      public Monster(double x, double y, double z, int health, float width, float height, float depth, float speed, int damage, processing.core.PImage monsterImage, processing.core.PApplet p)
      Creates a new instance of a Monster
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the monster
      y - the y-coordinate of the monster
      z - the z-coordinate of the monster
      health - the health of the monster
      width - the width of the monster
      height - the height of the monster
      depth - the depth of the monster
      speed - the speed of the monster
      damage - the damage the monster deals
      monsterImage - the image for the monster
      p - the PApplet in which the monster is drawn

      Moves the monster

    • calculateNextPosition

      public float[] calculateNextPosition(Player player)
      Calculates the next position the monster will move to
      Parameters:
      player - the Player of the game
      Returns:
      the float array containing the x, y, and z coordinates, in order

      Checks if the player is intersecting the Monster
      Parameters:
